comment._content: He is a handsome soldier...and would not have thought he was African American.
comment.authorname: FAREWELL AND BEST WISHES TO YOU

comment.author: 62218313@N08
comment._content: The use of African American is a misnomer.   These black solders were not Americans. hey were either freed black Americans, slaves, or black Africans.  They certainly were not Americans.  the continued use of a misnomer does not turn it into a fact.  to call them American is blatant hubris and an insult to them and to their descendants who bled and died to become Americans. The continued attempt to paint black Americans whose ancestors were here before the Pilgrims landed and their ancestors with one brush stroke is disingenuous.
